Job Description: Qualification : Graduation   Key Skill : Telecalling   Experience : Freshers    JOB DESCRIPTION    Consistently make a good first impression when calling leads   Commit to departmental and individual quotas/goals   Meet company expectations for excellent customer service   Update contacts database when necessary   Answer all customer questions honestly and accurately   Maintain a friendly, professional tone at all times   Basic computer skills, including Microsoft Word and Excel   Excellent telephone etiquette   Excellent communication skills   Generating and qualifying leads from cold calling   Managing, tracking and following up on leads by calling them
Functional Area: ITES, BPO, KPO, LPO, Customer Service, Operations,
